passages.text:
The town is quiet, streetlights hum, illuminating an empty street, except for the shadow of a waddling raccoon, slipping into an alley behind the restaurant for a midnight snack.

The town center quickly gives way to residential homes, all dark with sleeping cars in driveways. The occasional flicker of an unattended TV set shines through thin curtains.

In the second story of one of these houses, a bright yellow light spills from a window into the darkness outside, which was thick enough to prevent said light from reaching the sidewalk. 

Inside, a computer clock flips over to 2:00AM, the room silent except for the crunching of tortilla chips, and frantic clicks and clacks of the keyboard.

---

[[Next->Living Room]]
passages.name: Sleeping Town

passages.text:
The person inside is sprawled on their couch, hunched over a laptop. The TV at the other side of the room, across a coffee table covered in crumbs and junk mail, steadily shows a selection of movies releated to the recently-finished _Dinodon vs. Dodecapus_

Their laptop screen, however, is littered with open browser tabs, oddly-sized dark windows of code, and command terminals running various operations. One of the operations finishes, the computer emitting a soft, and disapproving "beep".

"Ugh." the quiet sigh fills the room that otherwise lacked sounds to fill it.

The open up a new window, connecting to a chat application, desperate enough for help to actually talk to someone.

{{#if username}}They enter `{{username}}`
{{else}}They enter their username.{{/if}}


{{#data_set username=">>"}}{{/data_set}}

---

[[Next->LambdaMix Server #lambda-help]]
passages.name: Living Room

passages.text:
**{{username}}**: Hey I need some help with a thing.

---

[[Restart->Sleeping Town]]
passages.name: LambdaMix Server #lambda-help
